description: A member of the Library Task Force, and is ranked Library Officer Second Class. He is typically seen smiling or laughing at his co-workers, especially concerning the conversations between Kasahara and Dojo. He is also one of the instructors in the task force. He often gives advice to Dojo or Kasahara in regards to the relationship between them, whether it be on a personal or professional level. He is partly responsible to Kasahara being drafted into the task force.
name: Komaki Mikihisa
